page.title: 03PETS IN PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: PETS Lots of people have pets for company.The most popular are{cats}and {dogs}.They are nice to love like my dog which is a collie bitch.She eats dog meat from a tin and lots of meaty bones.Her favorite toy is a ball.She knows the words," up,down,sit,bark ball and fetch". She is good fun to play with. I have a{Dutch rabbit}.She eats oats,dandelions and green vegetables. She lives in a hutch outside the house.Some people keep{hamsters}and {gerbils.}Two girls keep{cockatiels.} They have yellow and white feathers. They eat millet & seed from the pet shop.All the people who have pets love them and spend many hours looking after them.They are a comfort to older people and often scare away potential criminals.
